-- The indexing type
-- The family of types already equipped with instances
theorem _root_.is_smul_regular.pi {α : Type _} [∀ i, SMul α <| f i] {k : α} (hk : ∀ i, IsSMulRegular (f i) k) :
    IsSMulRegular (∀ i, f i) k := fun _ _ h => funext fun i => hk i (congr_fun h i : _)
#align is_smul_regular.pi is_smul_regular.pi
